segments.text: I'm terribly sorry to be so late . I had an article ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll knock yourself out the way you've worked.Why don't you slow down ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right.Now that everybody's here . Shall we be getting started ? Miss Lin , are you ready ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , thanks.Before I start , I'd like to thank Professor Smith for all his help in giving me unlimited access to his research materials .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excuse me , Miss Lin.Would you mind speaking up , please ? I can't hear you very well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I'll try to speak louder .
segments.speaker: S2
